title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 486 - Tax Lien And Bonds
content:

State Regulations
§ 486.1 - Lien of tax
§ 486.2 - Release of liens
§ 486.3 - Bonds or other security

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 486

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 509

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
